},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,sx:{color:"#f97316",fontWeight:"bold",textAlign:"center"},children:"Get in Touch"}),success&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:"success",sx:{mb:2},children:"Your message has been submitted successfully!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Name",name:"name",variant:"outlined",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,sx:{mb:2},required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Email",name:"email",variant:"outlined",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,sx:{mb:2},type:"email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Phone Number",name:"phone",variant:"outlined",value:formData.phone,onChange:handleChange,sx:{mb:2},type:"tel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Message",name:"message",variant:"outlined",value:formData.message,onChange:handleChange,multiline:true,rows:4,sx:{mb:3},required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",fullWidth:true,sx:{fontWeight:"bold",py:1.2,backgroundColor:"#f97316","&:hover":{backgroundColor:"#fb923c"}},children:"Submit"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{height:"100%",width:"100%",borderRadius:3,overflow:"hidden",display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://img.freepik.com/free-vector/car-rental-concept-illustration_114360-9267.jpg?semt=ais_hybrid&w=740",alt:"Contact Us",style:{width:"100%",height:"100%",objectFit:"cover",borderRadius:"12px"}})})})]})});};export default ContactForm;
